channel.title: Visualization on Little
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Little

item.title: Get Started
item.description: This is a test R markdown post to show a leaflet interactive plot. # Code borrowed from Leaflet R website library(geojsonio) library(leaflet) # File downloaded from the census website states <- geojson_read("../../data/gz_2010_us_040_00_5m.geojson", method="local", what = "sp") bins <- c(seq(1,200000,40000),Inf) pal <- colorBin("YlOrRd", domain = states$CENSUSAREA, bins = bins) labels <- sprintf( "<strong>%s</strong><br/>%g people / mi<sup>2</sup>", states$NAME, states$CENSUSAREA ) %>% lapply(htmltools::HTML) leaflet(states) %>% setView(-96, 37.
